00039 void UISearchResultsWidget::display_verse_text(const QModelIndex& index)
00040 {
00041     boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay> verse_to_display = m_results_model->get_verse_display(index);
00042     if (verse_to_display->get_verse_id() != -1)
00043         emit verse_display_changed(verse_to_display);
